00075 /* The prologue part of UA_Server_run (no need to use if you call UA_Server_run) */

00077 /* The epilogue part of UA_Server_run (no need to use if you call UA_Server_run) */

00105                           const UA_NumericRange *range, UA_DataValue *value);

00120 
00121 /* Value Callbacks can be attach to value and value type nodes. If not-null, they are called before
00122    reading and after writing respectively */
00123 typedef struct {
00124     void *handle;
00125     void (*onRead)(void *handle, const UA_NodeId nodeid, const UA_Variant *data, const UA_NumericRange *range);
00126     void (*onWrite)(void *handle, const UA_NodeId nodeid, const UA_Variant *data, const UA_NumericRange *range);
00127 } UA_ValueCallback;
